CmdLine: sed -i.bak 's/jessie main/jessie main contrib non-free/g' /etc/apt/sources.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y python-lxml python-pip git

CmdLine: cd /root/pyload-autodl && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install .

CmdLine: cd /usr/src && tar xvjf phantomjs-1.9.8-linux-x86_64.tar.bz2 && mv phantomjs-1.9.8-linux-x86_64 /usr/local/share && ln -sf /usr/local/share/phantomjs-1.9.8-linux-x86_64/bin/phantomjs /usr/local/bin
